file_content.text: To J Company!
Haha! That was fantastic!
Did you see that fat one run away? I think he was a lieutenant. Started crying for his mama.
You guys really put the fight in our boys. Won't be any holding them back now.
After seeing what they can do with a Jedi covering them, there won't be any holding our boys back.
You've got to stop being so blasted great. Half my boys want to quit now and go freelance.
I'm pretty sure every kid in this unit wants to grow up to be you today.
If it pushes back the Empire, it was time well spent.
I was glad to help.
Hear hear!
I'm awesome!
Ha! None of my friends are going to believe I know you.
Come back any time you want to share a keg with J Company!
Stop cheering and pay me.
Money? I'm a grunt. They barely pay me to eat. But I'll send a note to Command, see if they can swing anything.
And you're always welcome to a Corellian ale on J Company!
I'm ready to see some Imperial fireworks!
It's about time the Republic brought some real talent to bear!
If the Empire sees you all in one place, they're gonna hightail it right off Balmorra.
Never gotten to work side-by-side with a real Jedi.
When word gets out we've got Special Forces on the ground, we're going to get a wave of new recruits!
I hear you can give our best and brightest a run for their money.
You got any time to spare? We're about to take down the Empire's communications center, and it'd strike some real fear in their hearts if you led the charge.
Let the Empire see that the Jedi and Republic stand united to free Balmorra!
I will do it.
Hoo-wah! You need a microphone or something? Get the whole squad fired up?
"Leading the charge," is hardly my specialty, but if we can frighten the Empire off, perhaps fewer lives will be lost.
I will do what I can.
Uh, right, Master Jedi. Long as it's our lives we're saving, not theirs.
How can I turn down an offer like that?
Of course.
Hoo-wah! Hey, if I survive this, can I get you to sign my helmet? It'd be a kick for the guys back home.
You want me to lead your army?
You thought this through?
Sure. Never had a celebrity in the unit. It'll be good for morale.
What do you want me to do?
If they put you on it, they obviously don't need anyone of my caliber.
It's not worth my time.
Need, shmeed. I just thought you'd want to join the fun!
Traken-4's an Imperial base, heart of the Empire's Balmorra communications. We're gonna hit it hard and fast, take it out before they warn anyone the Republic's landed.
If you're in, you can go ahead and take out their artillery before we move in with full strength.
Get your men ready. They won't have much of a window.
I'll go right now.
We're chomping the bit, don't you worry.
I'll try to fit it in.
We'll be watching. Minute you take out the first ring of defenses, I'll give the signal.
Use this. It should jam the frequency for their AA guns, sensors, comm relays. The whole shebang.
Then we move in and boom! Imperial jelly.
Too risky. [Refuse quest]
Then it's all up to J Company!
This planet's gonna be ours by sunset!
You got any time to spare? We're about to run the Empire off Balmorra for good, and it'd strike some real fear in their hearts if you led the charge.
Whoever holds the Balmorran Arms Factory holds Balmorra. Empire thinks they can retake the factory by finishing an abandoned access corridor.
We've got the ordnance to destroy the monster drill they're using. You take out the Imps' defenses along the way, and we'll hit the drill together.
